LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C1.title: Innocent Childhood
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C1.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to and grew up in an isolated tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] flourished, being unexposed to danger.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C2.title: Adopted in Power
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C2.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s birthplace was lost in a war when [PAWN_pronoun] was very young. Luckily, [PAWN_pronoun] was adopted by a powerful person, and learned to thrive amongst nobility.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C3.title: Nomad's Daughter
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C3.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is the child of a nomadic father and a Nearmare mother. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up surrounded by Mother Nature and learned many of her secrets.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C4.title: Chef's Child
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C4.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is the child of a chef fascinated by the world of cooking. [PAWN_pronoun]'s still an amateur, but can still cook better than the average person.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C5.title: Soldier in Training
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C5.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] trained as a soldier from a very early age. [PAWN_pronoun] can handle both melee and ranged combat to some degree.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C6.title: Small Undergrounder
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_C6.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost their hometown and has lived in a dark cavern ever since. Such a life has taught [PAWN_pronoun] much about mining and construction.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A1.title: Charming Companion
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A1.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is skilled at using their natural charm to manipulate others, but shies from physical conflict.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A2.title: Zealous Architect
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A2.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] unexpectedly woke to their talent as an architect. However, a need to impose order leaves [PAWN_pronoun] frustrated by wild animals.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A3.title: Beautiful Archer
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A3.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is skilled at shooting distance targets, whether by bow or gun.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A4.title: Bewitching Warrior
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A4.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a consummate warrior with no qualms about killing.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A5.title: Sexy Designer
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A5.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a designed with a plethora of ideas and finely honed art skills.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A6.title: Mountain Hikikomori
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A6.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] would much rather dig holes than interact with people. Today [PAWN_pronoun] will continue to mine for ore.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A7.title: Night Maid
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A7.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] serves a famous and powerful person as a maid. Cooking is her specialty.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A8.title: Beauty Artist
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A8.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an artist of many works. The type of art depends on sensitivity.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A9.title: Demon Professor
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A9.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] writes eccentric theses on demonic ideas. Surprisingly, they're highly regarded.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A10.title: Popular Ordinary Girl
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A10.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an ordinary girl, but it seems she's very popular amongst the opposite sex.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A11.title: Dreaming Beastmaster
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A11.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] dreams of taming beasts from all over the world - but beware Mother Nature's wonders...
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A12.title: Nightmare in White
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A12.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an expert nurse. Making mistakes once in a while simply adds to her charm...
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Backstory_A90.title: Merchant of Nightmares
